ygData.subject: Peace talks?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She heard him say that the peace talks may still be on. But where are they going to be held?  I can t invite the leader to a meeting with no meeting

::Battera::

She heard him say that the peace talks may still be on.
"But where are they going to be held?  I can't invite the leader to a 
meeting with no meeting place?"
